SpaceTrail Welcome to Space Trail Settings New Game Load Game Instructions Please select your explorer's names! Spaceship Captain's Name: Name Buy Resources! Head to Space! Name of other space adventurer's Money: to spend Fuel @ $5.00 Food @ $4.00 Spare Engines @ $100.00 ship Aluminum @ $10.00 Spare Wings @ $100.00 Spare Living Bay @ $100.00 Buy! Quantity You Have load_game GAME INFORMATION People: Ship: Resources: Captain Name1 Info1 Planet Engine Living Bay Hull Wings Fuel Food Spare Engines Aluminum Spare Wings Spare Living Bays SpaceActivity game_screen Travel Information game_info Back Are you sure you want to quit? Your game will be saved. OK Cancel Hello explorer!

You have traveled thousands of lightyears to explore other galaxies and have just entered a new solar system. This solar system has nine different planets, each with their own qualities and distinctions. To gather information about each of these planets, you will need to travel to each one and conduct research.

As an experienced space explorer like yourself would know, there are many challenges and difficulties that can arise with exploring unknown galaxies. Be cautious in all of your actions so you can make it back to your home planet with all your new data! Make sure to conserve your resources and make sure to not stay too long on planets that have atmospheres that are toxic to your race!

When you press the start button, you will be able to purchase the resources you will need for your journey through the new solar system. You will be able to buy food, fuel, and spare parts. You will be able to purchase additional supplies on your journey on different planets, however the costs will change depending on the planet you are currently visiting.You will also be able to mine asteroids for fuel when traveling, however this comes at a risk of asteroids hitting you and damaging your ship.

Some helpful tips! Tap the screen to move the spaceship toward the planet when on the travel page. Press and hold on the screen when in the travel page to pull up a page with all of your supplies and resources. As you approach planets with compounds that your race needs, your crew's health will increase, however if you approach a planet with a toxic compound then your crew's health will decrease. Also, the elderly members of your crew (ages 75 and older) will naturally have their health decrease each turn.

Good luck and safe travels! Which planet do you want to travel to? Alert! Alert! Alert! Crew Information PlanetActivity Welcome to Head to
Next Planet! Price: $
